name: Tap Candy Bomb
description:
Tap Candy Bomb is a very interesting game,Tap on two or more adjacent stars to destroy them.An exciting game with cool UI and Effects

How to Play:
- Tap two or more blocks of the same color to destroy them..
- There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.
- More bonus with less blocks at the end of each stage. Try to clear all blocks, you will get a lot of bonus.
